name: Technical Translator/ Contract Manager Assistant
description:
Roles:

  • Performing of verbal and written translations;
  • Coordinate with the Technical Translator/Junior Translator for dedicated tasks related to translations;
  • Providing support to Contract Manager in organization of contract and subcontract work.

Job responsibilities:

  • Support Contract Manager in dedicated tasks, such as: maintaining auditable files for all assigned contracts and subcontracts, giving support in direct negotiations with local Companies, carrying out cross-analysis on the received official documents both in English and Russian;
  • Draft Work Contracts, Contracts Revisions, Service Contracts and Purchase Orders;
  • Draft full comparisons price and quality analysis with particular focus and attention to details;
  • Actively participate in negotiations, meetings, work sessions and other events, in accordance with the Site Manager and Contract Manager needs;
  • Manage relationships with suppliers and subcontractors on behalf of Contract & Procurement Manager.
Requirements:
  • Relevant work experience as advantage;
  • Fluent English;
  • Good knowledge of Excel;
  • Organizational and communictional skills.
Conditions:
  • Location: territory of TOAZ;
  • 6-days working week (Monday - Saturday, Sunday is day off);
  • Transportation from all districts of Togliatti;
  • Compensation of meals.

We kindly ask you to send your CV in English, thank you in advance!
